page.title: 06SILCOATES SUMMER SCHOOL
page.content: Every year there is a summer school at Silcoates School for children aged nine to thirteen. There are 12 activities like archery, art, badminton, canoeing, computering, cricket, golf, rugby, squash, swimming, table tennis and tennis. If you want to do canoeing you have to be able to swim at least 50 metres. You can swim in the afternoons and do canoeing in the mornings. The course costs Â£42.50 and includes lunch every day. Each day is split into four sessions: 9.30_10.30, 10.45_11.45, 1.00_2.00, 2.15_3.15. Boys and girls may choose 4 activities, one for each session or 3 activities, spending two sessions on one activity. I am hoping to take part in canoeing, archery, art and swimming. I am looking forward to it very much.
